title: Open Cut
creator_credit: Australian Film Commission, Film Camp, Philippa Campey and Phil Burke
brief_description: Using extensive archival recordings of this once model town, filmmaker Phil Burke revisits his home town of Yallourn and explores some of the issues which led to its destruction.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Film Commission, Film Camp, Philippa Campey and Phil Burke
